name: Catogram Social Media Graphics Builder, v.1.1
description:
Make cute cat promotional graphics for projects, businesses, and announcements with Catogram!


You can create adorable, eye-catching twitter promo or (any promos) by choosing and customizing backgrounds, cats, expressions, objects, and messaging!


File Contains:

  • 9 customizable cat bodies
  • 7 types of cute cat expression
  • 3 customizable backgrounds
  • additional customizable objects like Christmas trees, gift boxes, signs, and hearts


I made this as a giveaway for my newsletter, FontDiscovery. Check it out if you'd like.


AI and svg files are also on gumroad:

https://typogram.gumroad.com/l/catogram
